sentences.en: A galaxy of twinkling stars matched the thousands of sparkling city lights.
sentences.cn: 闪烁的繁星与城内闪耀的万家灯火交相辉映.

sentences.en: Clods were handy and the air was full of them in a twinkling.
sentences.cn: 地上的泥块顺手可得,于是汤姆捡起泥块朝希德扔过去.

sentences.en: He was a twinkling - eyed, pimple - faced man, with his hair standing upright all over his head.
sentences.cn: 他这个人,两只眼直眨巴, 满脸都是粉刺儿, 满头的头发都直挺挺地扎撒着.

sentences.en: He was off, on the wings of the wind , in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.cn: 转瞬之间他就一阵风似地离开了.

sentences.en: His eyes, twinkling with cunning enjoyment , glanced at every moment towards his companion's face.
sentences.cn: 他的眼光闪动着, 显出狡黠而满意的神情, 并且不断瞟看那伙伴的面孔.

sentences.en: In the twinkling of an eye the oil burst into fire.
sentences.cn: 一眨眼工夫,油就冒出了火焰.

sentences.en: Miss heart only stars know, heart desire only you know, when you see the stars twinkling in the sky, is my best wishes to you.
sentences.cn: 思念的心只有星星知道，心中的愿望只有你知道，当你看见星星闪烁的夜空，就是我的祝福在向你致意。

sentences.en: On a clear night, I could see stars twinkling in the sky.
sentences.cn: 在晴朗的夜晚，我可以看见星星在天空闪烁。

sentences.en: Overhead, stars were twinkling in the deep blue of the sky.
sentences.cn: 星光在深蓝的天空睒着眼.

sentences.en: She smiled at me with her unforgettable twinkling blue eyes.
sentences.cn: 她冲我微微一笑,令人难忘的那双蓝眼睛闪着光芒.

sentences.en: That's fantastic . He's vanished in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.cn: 他怎么一转眼就不见了, 真见鬼.

sentences.en: The mood of the crowd can change in the twinkling of an eye.
sentences.cn: 群众情绪转眼就能发生变化.

sentences.en: The seasons change fast and it have passed more than 15 years in a twinkling.
sentences.cn: 斗转星移,转眼间又过了15年.

sentences.en: The sky was dark, stars were twinkling high above , night was reigning , and everything was sunk in silken silence.
sentences.cn: 天很黑, 星很繁,夜阑人静.

sentences.en: The sky was studded with twinkling stars.
sentences.cn: 天空满布着闪烁的星星.

sentences.en: The street slept in darkness, aside from the occasional twinkling of lights from two or three windows.
sentences.cn: 除了两三个窗户里有灯光偶尔闪烁一下,街上一片漆黑.

sentences.en: The tune set our toes twinkling.
sentences.cn: 这个曲调一响起,我们的足趾也跟着摆动起来.

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁，眨眼间，诙谐的闪光，一刹那
闪烁( twinkle的现在分词 )，（眼睛）闪亮，（经光照耀而）闪闪发光，（舞蹈者的双脚）轻快地移动
